languages.text: "Работать с плазмой опасно, но экипаж подобрался толковый, инцидентов немного. Почтенные техножрецы нами довольны, духи машин трудятся исправно. Инфернусы на нас тоже не жалуются — трещины в корпусе реактора чиним в срок, протечки устраняем".

"Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."
languages.original_text: "Работать с плазмой опасно, но экипаж подобрался толковый, инцидентов немного. Почтенные техножрецы нами довольны, духи машин трудятся исправно. Инфернусы на нас тоже не жалуются — трещины в корпусе реактора чиним в срок, протечки устраняем".

traits.locale_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

"Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

languages.text: «Trabajar con plasma es peligroso, pero el personal es competente y apenas hemos sufrido incidentes. Los estimados tecnosacerdotes están complacidos con nosotros, todos los espíritus máquina trabajan como deberían. Los infernus tampoco tienen queja: somos rápidos sellando brechas en el reactor de la nave y reparando fugas».
languages.original_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

traits.locale_text: «Trabajar con plasma es peligroso, pero el personal es competente y apenas hemos sufrido incidentes. Los estimados tecnosacerdotes están complacidos con nosotros, todos los espíritus máquina trabajan como deberían. Los infernus tampoco tienen queja: somos rápidos sellando brechas en el reactor de la nave y reparando fugas».

languages.text: 「プラズマを使う仕事は危険ですが、優秀なクルーがいる上、事故も少ない。尊敬する技術司祭たちは私たちに満足していますし、機械精霊はすべて本来の働きをしています。インフェルニも私たちに文句は言いません。原子炉容器のひび割れを時間通りに修理し、漏れを直します」
languages.original_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

traits.locale_text: 「プラズマを使う仕事は危険ですが、優秀なクルーがいる上、事故も少ない。尊敬する技術司祭たちは私たちに満足していますし、機械精霊はすべて本来の働きをしています。インフェルニも私たちに文句は言いません。原子炉容器のひび割れを時間通りに修理し、漏れを直します」

languages.text: “和等离子打交道相当危险，但大家的手艺都相当出色，没发生过太多事故。尊敬的技术神甫对我们很满意，所有机魂都按照要求正常工作。控火行会的人对我们也没有任何怨言，因为我们及时修复了反应堆容器的裂缝，所有泄露的地方都堵好了。”
languages.original_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

traits.locale_text: “和等离子打交道相当危险，但大家的手艺都相当出色，没发生过太多事故。尊敬的技术神甫对我们很满意，所有机魂都按照要求正常工作。控火行会的人对我们也没有任何怨言，因为我们及时修复了反应堆容器的裂缝，所有泄露的地方都堵好了。”

languages.text: "Die Arbeit mit Plasma ist gefährlich, aber wir haben eine gute Crew und nicht allzu viele Zwischenfälle. Die geschätzten Techpriester sind mit uns zufrieden, die Maschinengeister arbeiten wie sie sollten. Auch die Inferni beschweren sich nicht ... wir reparieren Risse in der Reaktorhülle und stopfen Lecks."
languages.original_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

traits.locale_text: "Die Arbeit mit Plasma ist gefährlich, aber wir haben eine gute Crew und nicht allzu viele Zwischenfälle. Die geschätzten Techpriester sind mit uns zufrieden, die Maschinengeister arbeiten wie sie sollten. Auch die Inferni beschweren sich nicht ... wir reparieren Risse in der Reaktorhülle und stopfen Lecks."

languages.text: « Travailler le plasma n'est pas sans danger, mais l'équipe est suffisamment rodée pour que les incidents restent exceptionnels. Les honorables technoprêtres semblent satisfaits de notre boulot, et les esprits de la machine fonctionnent on ne peut mieux. Même les inferni n'ont rien à redire à notre sujet, puisqu'on répare les fissures dans le réacteur et les fuites dans les temps. »
languages.original_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."

traits.locale_text: « Travailler le plasma n'est pas sans danger, mais l'équipe est suffisamment rodée pour que les incidents restent exceptionnels. Les honorables technoprêtres semblent satisfaits de notre boulot, et les esprits de la machine fonctionnent on ne peut mieux. Même les inferni n'ont rien à redire à notre sujet, puisqu'on répare les fissures dans le réacteur et les fuites dans les temps. »

languages.text: "Plazmayla iş yapmak tehlikeli olsa da mürettebatımız iyi ve çok fazla kaza olmuyor. Muhterem Tekno Rahipler, bizden pek memnunlar. Makine ruhları da ideal şekilde işliyor. İtfacılar da bizden şikâyetçi değil. Reaktör aracındaki çatlakları zamanında onarıyoruz ve sızıntılarla da ilgileniyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Working with plasma is dangerous, but we have a good crew, and not too many incidents. The esteemed Tech-Priests are satisfied with us, the machine spirits are all working as they should. The inferni don't complain about us either — we fix cracks in the reactor vessel on time, and we fix leaks."
